name: Vertex Shader File
summary: Learn about .VS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Vertex shader files more often use the .VSH extension. Vertex shader files with the ".vs" extension may not use the same format depending on the target graphics engine.

description: File used by OpenGL and DirectX applications and games; saves lighting properties for vertices, which are points in 3D space; enables a 3D model to have shading effects; saved in a plain text format.
